TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class StateManagedCollection : System.Collections.IList, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StateManagedCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class StateManagedCollection Implements IList, IStateManager
public ref class StateManagedCollection abstract : System::Collections::IList, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type StateManagedCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IStateManager

summary.span: 为管理 对象的所有强类型集合提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for all strongly typed collections that manage objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是存储元素的所有强类型集合 （包括、、、 和其他集合）的基类。The class is the base class for all strongly typed collections that store elements, including , , , , and others. 集合管理其自己的状态以及它所包含的元素的状态。The collection manages its own state as well as the state of the elements it contains. 因此，对的调用将 保存集合的状态和集合当前包含的所有元素的状态。Therefore, a call to saves the state of the collection and the state of all the elements currently contained by the collection. 从类派生时要考虑的最重要的方法 是 、 、 、 和 。The most important methods to consider when deriving from the class are , , , , and . 和 方法用于为包含的元素的类型在视图状态中存储索引。The and methods are used to store an index in view state for the type of a contained element. 存储索引（而不是完全限定的类型名称）可以提高性能。Storing an index rather than a fully qualified type name improves performance. 只要操作集合的元素，就会调用方法，并根据业务规则验证元素。The method is called whenever elements of the collection are manipulated, and validates the elements according to business rules. 目前，方法的实现 禁止将 `null` 对象存储在集合中; 但是，你可以重写此方法以定义你自己在派生类型中的验证行为。Currently, the implementation of the method prohibits `null` objects from being stored in the collection; however, you can override this method to define your own validation behavior in a derived type. 方法强制将整个集合序列化为视图状态，而不只是序列化自上次加载后对状态所做的更改。The method forces the entire collection to be serialized to view state, rather than just serializing changes made to state since the last time it was loaded. 方法是一个抽象方法，你可以实现此方法以在元素级别执行此相同行为。The method is an abstract method you can implement to perform this same behavior at the element level. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将集合项的程序集限定类型名称存储在视图状态中。 stores assembly-qualified type names of the collection items in view state. 站点访问者可以解码视图状态并检索类型名称。A site visitor could decode the view state and retrieve the type name. 如果此方案在您的网站中产生安全问题，则您可以在将类型名称放入视图状态之前手动对其进行加密。If this scenario creates a security concern in your Web site, you can manually encrypt the type name before placing it in the view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生一个强类型化集合类 以包含 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a strongly typed collection class from to contain objects. 在此示例中， `CycleCollection` 派生了包含抽象 `Cycle` 类（可以是或对象）的实例 `Bicycle` `Tricycle` 。In this example, the `CycleCollection` is derived to contain instances of the abstract `Cycle` class, which can be either `Bicycle` or `Tricycle` objects. `Cycle`类实现接口， 因为它将属性的值存储 `CycleColor` 在视图状态中。The `Cycle` class implements the interface because it stores the value of the `CycleColor` property in view state. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/CS/statemanagedcollectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/VB/statemanagedcollectionsample.vb#1)]

span.span: Copies the elements of the collection to an array, starting at a particular array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的数组必须是兼容的类型。The specified array must be of a compatible type. 元素按照枚举数循环访问 集合的顺序复制到 中。The elements are copied to the in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the collection.

summary.span: 在派生类中替代时，创建实现 的类的实例。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of a class that implements .

summary.span: 所创建对象的类型基于由 方法返回的集合的指定成员。

span.span: The type of object created is based on the specified member of the collection returned by the method.

returns.span: 根据提供的 从 派生的类的实例。

span.span: An instance of a class derived from , according to the provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 在方法的实现中由集合在内部调用 。The method is called internally by the collection in its implementation of the method. 派生集合重写 方法以返回 由提供的标识的类型的默认实例 `index` ，该实例映射到该方法返回的类型之一 。Derived collections override the method to return a default instance of the type identified by the provided `index`, which maps to one of the types returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示强类型类如何 实现 方法。The following code example demonstrates how a strongly typed class implements the method. `CycleCollection`的实现根据 `Bicycle` 传递的索引返回或对象的默认实例 `Tricycle` 。The `CycleCollection` implementation of returns the default instance of either a `Bicycle` or `Tricycle` object, depending on the index passed. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/CS/statemanagedcollectionsample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.CycleCollection/VB/statemanagedcollectionsample.vb#2)]

exception.span: 用于不在派生的类中重写的所有情况。

span.span: In all cases when not overridden in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法来验证通过 实现接口方法操作的对象 。The method is called to validate the object manipulated through the implementation of the interface methods. 默认实现是验证集合操作的对象是否不是 `null` ; 但是，从派生的集合 重写 方法以执行任何其他验证，如类型检查。The default implementation is to verify that the object manipulated by the collection is not `null`; however, collections derived from override the method to perform any additional validation, such as type-checking.

Public Sub SetDirty ()
public: void SetDirty();
member this.SetDirty : unit -> unit

summary.span: 强制将整个 集合序列化为视图状态。

span.span: Forces the entire collection to be serialized into view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法强制 完全 (序列化集合，而 方法仅将更改信息保存) 中。The method forces the collection to be serialized completely (whereas the method saves only the change information). 此方法在以下情况下很有用：集合已更改很重要，并且更改信息不足以在内存中从视图状态重新创建对象。This is useful when a collection has changed in a significant way and change information is insufficient to recreate the object in memory from view state.

span.span: The that should serialize itself completely.

summary.span: 在派生类中替代时，指示集合包含的 将其全部状态记录到视图状态，而不是仅记录更改信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, instructs an contained by the collection to record its entire state to view state, rather than recording only change information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由 、 和方法在内部调用 。The method is called internally by the , , and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示强类型类如何 实现抽象 方法。The following code example demonstrates how a strongly typed class implements the abstract method. `CycleCollection`使用 对象存储其视图状态信息，只是将调用委托给 对象的方法 。The `CycleCollection` uses a object to store its view-state information, and simply delegates the call to the method of the object. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. param.name: savedState
param.span: 表示要还原的集合和集合元素的状态的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the collection and collection elements' state to restore.

summary.span: 还原 集合以及其包含的 项的以前保存的视图状态。

span.span: Restores the previously saved view state of the collection and the items it contains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还原由方法保存的视图状态信息 。This method restores view-state information that was saved by the method. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是类的实例 。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85)). 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 您可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。You can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

abstract member System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState : unit -> obj override this.System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后对 集合和该集合包含的每个 对象所做的更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the collection and each object it contains since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含对 及其包含的项的视图状态所做更改的对象。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state of the and the items it contains.

returns.span: 如果没有与集合及其元素关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the collection and its elements, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是类的实例 。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85)). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为 () 的 HTML 隐藏元素中存储的变量返回给客户端 `` 。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML hidden element (``). 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的属性来提高效率 。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85)) 和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85)) and[ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

virtual void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() = System::Web::UI::IStateManager::TrackViewState;
abstract member System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState : unit -> unit override this.System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState : unit -> unit

summary.span: 使 集合及其包含的每个 对象跟踪对它们的视图状态所做的更改，以使它们可以在相同页的请求之间得以保持。

span.span: Causes the collection and each of the objects it contains to track changes to their view state so they can be persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是类的实例 。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85)).
